title: Survee
description: This is my first project to grow into a Full stack developer. it is still work in progress since Jun 2022.

title: Agtube
description: Agtube means literally Agnes + Youtube. I built this website with Youtube Open API. You can select the darkmode and see the list and detail pages, related videos, and also can search by keywords.

title: Todones
description: I built this website used by React.js You can select the darkmode and create, read, update, and also delete Todos.

title: Road to Frontend
